comments.comment: Ven. Omalpe Sobitha Thero , it‚Äôs attorney general who took action after the police forward credible evidence against Patali Champika. President Gota has nothing to do about it. If there‚Äôs no credible evidence he will be freed. If he committed a crime, he will be punish. Why should you criticize ,complain or showing your displeasure? I can‚Äôt understand. And I did not hear you said anything when MR government ministers, officials put into remand months and finally freed without proving anything during 2015-16. Remember what happened to Udaya Gammanpila hamuduruwane? Were not they unique like Champika? Did not it a political revenge? Nobody is above the law hamuduruwane. When people talking about other people, they ask why don‚Äôt our leader not taking action against so and so but when our closest one get arrested, we criticize the same leader, saying he is going wrong way or going to become an autocrat. Champika was a good person but after he did make alliance with Ranil, he became a monster. Like Champika all the other culprits for corrupt activities will be arrest, but not by Gota‚Äôs orders but by Attorney General‚Äôs orders. And how soon it will happen depend on his department‚Äôs activity . But some cases takes time. I am 100% sure that President Gota never involves in Attorney General‚Äôs affairs. And also I am sure that our Attorney General is not a person who will succumb to any pressure  even from the President. And finally please don‚Äôt involve religion in judicial matters. And if you do it, you are challenging the attorney general and his actions. And it is a punishable offense. And also disrespect to the judicial system. Let the court decide the fate of Champika. And , Yes our common enemy, the Islamic extremists must stop. But regretfully I want to remind you that, Champika aligned with the Muslim extremists for the last four and half years for his own benefit.

comments.comment: Amathyansawala wadakarala amathyanse ma mudal miliyana ganan thamange deshapalana pachara walata yodagath minihek.e asarana lamayatath e demawpiyantath sadaranayak ituwiya yuthui.duracharaye adinawa e gunayahapath daksha amathiwarayata pahadadenna suwamini.patali hoda jathikathwayakin yuthu hagimakin katayuthu kala ayek thamai.mamath ohuta nirathuruwama chandaya labadunna.namuth pasukalayaka ohu ranilge upakkramasili deshapalanaye iththek una.ehi prathipalayak lesin ohuta hakiuna hakimla,badurdinla ekka ekata hitsganna.asadaranayata lawunu daruwa ha demawpiyan wenuwen sadaranayak ituviya yuthumai.patali thamage deshapalana haiya upayogi karaganimin me naduwe nadubanda vinasa kalabawa kiyawenawa.ebavin nawatha me sambandawa niwaradi parikshanayak siduviya yuthui.e pilibadawa waradi paniwidayak samaja gatha kirimata uthsahaganne obawahanselai.eda hitapu patali ada nathi bawa ratama awaboda karagena athi pasubimaka obawahanse megana kathakota aprasadayata lak nowana lesa namaskarapurwakawa illa sitimi obawahanseta theruwan saranai.
